title: The Game Awards 2020 Nominations - Kinda Funny Games Daily 11.18.20
description:
Gary Whitta doesn't care about awards shows, but Greg's gonna make him talk about the Game Awards regardless!

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:04:00 - Housekeeping
The Kinda Funny Podcast - We Do An Escape Room
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Black Jack & Tom Bock
The Roper Report   -
00:06:20 - The Game Awards Nominations are here!
00:09:45 - Does Geoff think that he will not get as many game announcements if he moves the Game Awards to January? - Best Friends Q:Witt
00:31:27 - Among us got nominated for an award (but weirdly not the best ongoing game? - Best Friends Q:Krajookee
00:34:28 - Do you think this is odd to have something that's not going to be released this year be nominated, or has Obsidian shown enough to deserve the award? - Best Friends Q:Riot Goes Woof
00:40:41 - Hyrule Warriors: Age of Calamity Review Round-Up
 - DeeJ goes to Iron Galaxy
 - Out today
  - Squad Up:Jordan McCarthy (PS5) - JPDMacca
- You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Greg and Tim
